title: G.O.D (God Of Defence) (Premium) v1.0.9
description:
Defend your sealed gates of hell against undead legions as only a god can.
For many years, the old sealed gate that protects the human world from hell has been weakened. 

Undead legions from hell are trying to break through the gate and attack the human race.

No mere army can stand against them but you do not command just a mere army. 
You are charged with the defense of the sealed gate, willing to employ any and all means to protect your charges.

Unleash devastating fire, merciless plasma, and purifying ice upon the putrid enemy. Observe, analyze, and undermine their strategies, refine your own tactics, and dominate the field of battle.

Features:

* Develop your personal God of Defense by obtaining and upgrading three special elemental skills: fire, plasma, and ice 
* Master special attacks to devastate the enemy 
* Prove your deadly skills against 26 types of enemy, each with their own special attributes 
* Become the ultimate God of Defense with 12 different achievements 
* Track your success by comparing your wins to other players around the world

What's New:

[Update Information 1.0.9]
1. Daily Checking event added.(9/24~10/21)
2. Game playing optimized
3. Icon changed
4. Support new mobilephone.
